languages.text: "Я создан для... сражений. Мое тело распалено запахом крови... Оно хочет еще. Если я утрачу контроль... во время полета. В лучшем случае я уничтожу гондолу... и мы все погибнем..."
"I was made for... fighting. My body is excited by the smell of blood... It wants more. If I lose control... during the voyage... the best case is that I destroy the gondola... and we all die..."
languages.original_text: "Я создан для... сражений. Мое тело распалено запахом крови... Оно хочет еще. Если я утрачу контроль... во время полета. В лучшем случае я уничтожу гондолу... и мы все погибнем..."

traits.locale_text: "I was made for... fighting. My body is excited by the smell of blood... It wants more. If I lose control... during the voyage... the best case is that I destroy the gondola... and we all die..."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

traits.locale_text: "I was made for... fighting. My body is excited by the smell of blood... It wants more. If I lose control... during the voyage... the best case is that I destroy the gondola... and we all die..."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: “我是为了战斗……而存在……我一闻到鲜血的气味就会兴奋……渴求更多鲜血。如果我在航行中……发了狂……我会摧毁飞船……把所有人都害死……这恐怕还是最好的情况……”
languages.original_text: "I was made for... fighting. My body is excited by the smell of blood... It wants more. If I lose control... during the voyage... the best case is that I destroy the gondola... and we all die..."

traits.locale_text: “我是为了战斗……而存在……我一闻到鲜血的气味就会兴奋……渴求更多鲜血。如果我在航行中……发了狂……我会摧毁飞船……把所有人都害死……这恐怕还是最好的情况……”
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: «Existo para... luchar. Mi cuerpo se activa con el olor de la sangre... Exige más. Si pierdo el control... durante el viaje... lo mejor que puede pasar... es que destruya nuestro transporte... y todos muramos...».
languages.original_text: "I was made for... fighting. My body is excited by the smell of blood... It wants more. If I lose control... during the voyage... the best case is that I destroy the gondola... and we all die..."

traits.locale_text: «Existo para... luchar. Mi cuerpo se activa con el olor de la sangre... Exige más. Si pierdo el control... durante el viaje... lo mejor que puede pasar... es que destruya nuestro transporte... y todos muramos...».
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: 「私は…戦うために生まれてきました。この身体は血の臭いに歓喜し…いつでも血に飢えています。旅の途中で…制御できなくなれば…船を破壊し…最悪の場合、全員を殺してしまうでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "I was made for... fighting. My body is excited by the smell of blood... It wants more. If I lose control... during the voyage... the best case is that I destroy the gondola... and we all die..."

traits.locale_text: 「私は…戦うために生まれてきました。この身体は血の臭いに歓喜し…いつでも血に飢えています。旅の途中で…制御できなくなれば…船を破壊し…最悪の場合、全員を殺してしまうでしょう…」
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: "Ich wurde ... zum Kämpfen ... erschaffen. Der Duft von Blut erregt meinen Körper ... Er will mehr. Wenn ich auf der Reise ... die Kontrolle verliere ... zerstöre ich bestenfalls die Gondel ... und wir sterben alle ..."
languages.original_text: "I was made for... fighting. My body is excited by the smell of blood... It wants more. If I lose control... during the voyage... the best case is that I destroy the gondola... and we all die..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde ... zum Kämpfen ... erschaffen. Der Duft von Blut erregt meinen Körper ... Er will mehr. Wenn ich auf der Reise ... die Kontrolle verliere ... zerstöre ich bestenfalls die Gondel ... und wir sterben alle ..."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: « Combattre... est mon destin. Mon corps tout entier s'exalte à l'odeur du sang... Il en réclame toujours plus. Si je perds le contrôle... au cours du voyage... je risque de détruire la nacelle... et de tous nous tuer... »
languages.original_text: "I was made for... fighting. My body is excited by the smell of blood... It wants more. If I lose control... during the voyage... the best case is that I destroy the gondola... and we all die..."

traits.locale_text: « Combattre... est mon destin. Mon corps tout entier s'exalte à l'odeur du sang... Il en réclame toujours plus. Si je perds le contrôle... au cours du voyage... je risque de détruire la nacelle... et de tous nous tuer... »
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: "Ben savaşmak için yaratılmışım... Vücudum kan kokusunu alınca heyecanlanıyor... Daha fazlasını istiyor. Yolculuk sırasında kendimden geçersem... En iyi ihtimalle gondolu yok ederim... Hepimiz ölürüz..."
languages.original_text: "I was made for... fighting. My body is excited by the smell of blood... It wants more. If I lose control... during the voyage... the best case is that I destroy the gondola... and we all die..."

traits.locale_text: "Ben savaşmak için yaratılmışım... Vücudum kan kokusunu alınca heyecanlanıyor... Daha fazlasını istiyor. Yolculuk sırasında kendimden geçersem... En iyi ihtimalle gondolu yok ederim... Hepimiz ölürüz..."
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack
